info.official_title: Cohort Study of Mechanism and Process Regulation for Colorectal Tumors

identified_line.line: * Inclusion Criteria（Healthy control group）： 1) Aged more than 18 years; 2) Planned to undergo colonoscopy , without past medical history of neoplasm or ulcer or bleeding under colonoscopy regardless of the history of colonoscopy; 3) Willing to participate in this trial and signed the informed consent.
